Returns: Value for the no substitute behavior. If TRUE, methods of this locale data object will return an error when no data is available for that method, given the locale ID supplied to the constructor.
getNoSubstitute().Description: Gets the "no substitute" behavior of this locale data object.

Returns: The paper size used in the locale
Parameters: ULocale: The locale for which the measurement system to be retrieved.
getPaperSize(android.icu.util.ULocale).Description: Returns the size of paper used in the locale. The paper sizes returned are always in milli-meters.

getInstance().Description: Gets the LocaleData object associated with the default FORMAT locale

Parameters: ULocale: Locale with thich the locale data object is associated.
getInstance(android.icu.util.ULocale).Description: Gets the LocaleData object associated with the ULocale specified in locale

Parameters: int: The type of delimiter string desired. Currently, the valid choices are QUOTATION_START, QUOTATION_END, ALT_QUOTATION_START, or ALT_QUOTATION_END.
getDelimiter(int).Description: Retrieves a delimiter string from the locale data.

Parameters: boolean: Value for the no substitute behavior. If TRUE, methods of this locale data object will return an error when no data is available for that method, given the locale ID supplied to the constructor.
setNoSubstitute(boolean).Description: Sets the "no substitute" behavior of this locale data object.

Returns: MeasurementSystem the measurement system used in the locale.
Parameters: ULocale: The locale for which the measurement system to be retrieved.
getMeasurementSystem(android.icu.util.UL.Description: Returns the measurement system used in the locale specified by the locale.

ClassDesc: A class for accessing miscellaneous data in the locale bundles
